network_overview: The capture contains a single low-volume signaling flow using SCTP between 10.47.82.11:9082 and 10.1.244.8:9082 (11 packets, 1,636 bytes) over ~21.09 seconds. No higher-layer telecom signaling protocols or message decodes are present in the provided evidence, so only transport-level observations can be made.

observations.finding: Single SCTP signaling flow observed with low packet rate (11 packets over ~21.09s, ~0.52 pps), which is consistent with a small control-plane exchange at the transport level; no application-layer messages are provided to validate purpose or outcome.

Only SCTP is detected. No decoded telecom application protocol messages (e.g., S1AP/NGAP or others) are explicitly present in the evidence, so procedure success/failure and any 3GPP cause-based diagnosis are not observable.
observations.evidence: Protocols Detected: SCTP; No expert warnings; No procedure statistics; No deep transactions available

inconclusive_aspects.aspect: Whether any 3GPP signaling procedure succeeded or failed
inconclusive_aspects.reason: The evidence includes only SCTP flow statistics; no application-layer message types, procedure identifiers, or reject/response codes are provided.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: A decode containing the SCTP payload/application protocol messages (e.g., the actual signaling layer carried over SCTP) with timestamps and any response/cause fields.

inconclusive_aspects.aspect: Call/session establishment outcome (if this relates to a voice or data procedure)
inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, no SDP, no RTP, and no call classifications are present; total_calls=0 in the provided IMS/voice analysis.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture including the relevant application signaling for the service under test (at minimum, decoded message traces above SCTP) and, if voice is in scope, media-plane visibility at the appropriate observation point.

inconclusive_aspects.aspect: Transport-level failure indicators within SCTP (e.g., association setup failure vs. normal exchange)
inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SCTP chunk/message details (INIT/INIT-ACK/ABORT/HEARTBEAT/ERROR) are explicitly provided—only aggregate flow counters and timing.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Packet-level SCTP decode showing chunk types and any SCTP error indications, alongside both directions of the flow with complete packet capture.

recommendations.action: Re-export or re-run decoding to include SCTP payload/application-layer protocol dissection (beyond flow statistics) with message names and any cause/response fields.
recommendations.rationale: Root cause and 3GPP pattern matching require explicit message-level evidence; current evidence only confirms SCTP transport presence and basic flow characteristics.

recommendations.action: Confirm the observation point and capture both directions consistently for the involved network elements (10.47.82.11 and 10.1.244.8) during the same time window.
recommendations.rationale: Without observation point context and full bidirectional decode, procedure outcomes and failure localization cannot be determined from transport statistics alone.

session_analysis.signaling_health: SCTP signaling transport is observed (single flow, low packet rate). No explicit SCTP error events or higher-layer success/failure indicators are present in the provided evidence, so signaling outcome is not determinable.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point (no user-plane protocols/tunnels are present; GTP tunnels reported as 0).
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point (no SIP/SDP/RTP present; no RTP quality metrics available).
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Not possible from this evidence because only SCTP transport flow statistics are available and no user-plane or voice/media layer data is present.
